WE ARE CHOOSING TO DO ADVENTURE 2.

```{r, message = FALSE}
library(caret)
library(e1071)
library(dplyr)
```


```{r}
kangaroo <- read.csv("https://www.macalester.edu/~ajohns24/data/kangaroo.csv")
#kangaroo <- kangaroo %>%
  #filter(species == c("giganteus", "fuliginosus"))
```

```{r}
#set the seed
set.seed(253)

#Tuning parameter c
c <- seq(0.01, 2, length = 20)

#svm model
svm_model <- train(
  species ~ zygomatic.width + nasal.width,
  data = kangaroo,
  method = "svmLinear",
  trControl=trainControl(method = "cv", number = 10, selectionFunction = "oneSE"),
  preProcess = c("center", "scale"),
  metric = "Accuracy",
  tuneGrid = data.frame(C = c),
  na.action = na.omit
  )
```


```{r}
plot(svm_model)
```

```{r}
svm_model$results %>% 
  filter(C == svm_model$bestTune$C)
```
